entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
